review_data.title: Delicious sushi, great service!
review_data.content: I totally enjoyed my dinner here! One sushi avocado hand roll roll. Eel avocado roll was so good I had to have another. Will eat here again when I return to Staten Island, for sure!

review_data.title: Nice!
review_data.content: Lovely staff and the food is excellent. It is not cheap, but is definitely worth it. I recommend the miso soup and the sashimi. The spicy tuna is also very good.
